amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $450 million from the Fossil Fuel Research Account to ARPA-E.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for fossil fuels by $450 million and increase the account for Advanced Research Projects Agency--Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 276 (Roll no. 553).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 276 (Roll no. 553).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
